channel.title: What to do
channel.description:
I like this girl. A few weeks back, she dumped her current boyfriend and was considering going out with me or her ex. She ended up picking her ex over me, so I was a little upset. I met her ex when I was hanging out with her last weekend, and it turns out that he is a complete asshole and a druggie. I've told this girl (Samantha is her name btw) how much I care for her, but she doesn't seem to understand to the full extent in which I do so. Should I wait for her to realize the mistake she made over choosing her ex instead of me, or do I tell her the truth about her decision. Her past boyfriends have only gone out with her so they could get some, if you know what I mean, and I really want to kick current current ex-boyfriend's ass and the guy she's going out with at the moment.
I would appreciate some help, and please, no immature posts.

item.title: What to do
item.dc:creator: @billygotshot billygotshot
item.description:
@billygotshot wrote:

how about just go with the flow and dont make a topic about it on a forum based on cheating in games…

Read full topic

[quote=“Yz85Racer, post:9, topic:168713”][quote author=bigjim87 link=topic=228336.msg1962062#msg1962062 date=1198985630]
DO NOT TELL HER ANYTHING, she will eventually find out, be upset, and u will give her a shoulder to cry on (at least)
[/quote]
And a penis to ride on? Just kidding.
Err. Just wait, I would say.[/quote]
i lol’d

Read full topic

item.title: What to do
item.dc:creator: @dragonus18 dragonus18
item.description:

What are you talking about. I’ll show her this topic. As for my chances of getting her, they’re pretty solid.

your going to show the girl you like a topic you posted about her on a runescape cheating website?

Exactly what I thought at first.
And just to ruin the luck, lets all post about child ****. l0l

i do not want to, as thug-life might bring up that fake little screeny,

What one?

hahaahah well, he made one of me asking him for advice on child porn, he changed the vhost to my hostmask and changed the nick. (irc)
[/quote]
So make one up about him?[/quote]
enh, never thought of that, he admitted it so idc.

item.title: What to do
item.dc:creator: @Chimaera_God Chimaera God
item.description:
@Chimaera_God wrote:

I’m not going to pretend to care about her, because I actually do care for her, which I’ve made it known to her numerous times. Honestly, nobody takes things like this seriously. I can’t get her out of my mind, and I pretty much hang out with her every other day. I’m just going to let her realize what she did wrong, then she’ll come to me about it. I’m even talking to her right now on AIM lol.

Read full topic
